name: Doghost
description:
You've died. Now, you must find your friend using ONLY ONE sense.

Game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 where the theme was ONLY ONE.

Change Senses:

1. Sight (Look for you friend and avoid other people)

2. Move/Touch (You can pass through walls when this sense isn't selected)

3. Smell (Your friend smells in Blue)

Move with WASD

Game made by:

Francisco Hart - Programmer and Designer

Diego Rosas - Programmer

Nicolas Araujo - Art

Tomás Adam Taitz - Game Design & Sound Design

Thanks to this amazing sound libraries:

Allmedia Sound, Articulated Sounds, 2496SoundEffects, Pachamedias, Pole Position, Rock the Speakerbox and InspectorJ
